name: robot-sox
description: Robot Sox Linktree style using Eleventy Web Starter is a lightweight Eleventy boilerplate utilising, ESBuild Tailwind and PostCSS

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:postcss && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:11ty
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && postcss src/_assets/css/styles.css -o src/static/build/styles.min.css && esbuild src/_assets/scripts/scripts.js --bundle --outfile=dist/static/build/scripts.min.js --sourcemap && npm run build:11ty:dev

author: Chris Collins
